ing: freshly ground black pepper to taste
1/2 cup plain mini shredded wheat cereal biscuits
n: Spinach and Hazelnut Salad with Strawberry Balsamic Vinaigrette
des: "This salad has it all: great taste, protein, fiber, good fats, beautiful appearance, and it couldn't be easier to assemble. It will become one of your favorites. Vegan friendly! Give the shredded wheat a chance -- you might never want croutons on a salad again! Feel free to play with proportions of ingredients."
ins:
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, strawberry preserves, and black pepper.
In a large bowl, toss together spinach, lettuce, hazelnuts, raisins, red onion, and shredded wheat biscuits. Drizzle salad dressing over the salad, and toss gently to combine. Serve topped with sliced avocado.
